attributes.action: Introduce a Smartphone-Free Childhood Trial for All Children Under 16 in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Children under 16 are increasingly exposed to the risks of phone. 
This initiative will:
✅ Protect children from online predators, trafficking networks, and harmful digital content
🧠 Improve mental well-being by reducing screen dependency and social media pressure
📚 Encourage reading, imaginative play, and outdoor exploration
🎨 Foster creativity and independent thinking
 🗣️ Strengthen family bonds through real conversations and shared experiences
😴 Promote better sleep and reduce anxiety
attributes.background: We urge the UK Government to launch a nationwide trial encouraging families to raise children under 16 without smartphones, protecting them from digital dangers and nurturing their mental and emotional development.

rejection.details:
We call on Government to urgently revise the mobile phone in schools guidance
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726477
